headline: Biggest Gains in Employee Engagement in the Management Top 250
summary: Companies are graded in five categories: customer satisfaction, innovation, social responsibility, employee engagement and development, and financial strength.  Bendable Labs, a private firm, works with Drucker to perform the calculations and interpret them.  Exxon’s score for employee engagement and development rose 12.6 points from a year earlier to 50.8, Nucor’s score for the category climbed 8.6 points to 66.2 and  Motorola’s score increased 6.7 points to 66.3.

headline: Caterpillar: Diversification Without Diworsification; Home Depot Looks Healthy, So Do Others
summary: Diversify Caterpillar holdings with tax-efficient strategies. Explore HD, LOW, and SNA for income replacement potential and strong dividend growth.

headline: Emerson Completes Acquisition of Remaining Outstanding Shares of AspenTech
summary: Emerson (NYSE: EMR) today announced that it has completed its acquisition of all outstanding shares of common stock of Aspen Technology, Inc. ("AspenTech") not already owned by Emerson.
